scripts.deploy:avax:test: dotenv -e .env.avax.testnet -- hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AiPredictionV1.ts --network avalancheFujiTestnet --deployment-id avax-fuji-testnet
scripts.verify:avax:test: node scripts/generateArgs.cjs ignition/deployments/avax-fuji-testnet/journal.jsonl && dotenv -e .env.avax.testnet -- hardhat verify --network avalancheFujiTestnet --constructor-args-path ignition/deployments/avax-fuji-testnet/constructor-args.ts
scripts.deploy:sepolia: dotenv -e .env.eth.sepolia -- hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AiPredictionV1.ts --network sepolia --deployment-id sepolia-testnet
scripts.verify:sepolia: node scripts/generateArgs.cjs ignition/deployments/sepolia-testnet/journal.jsonl && dotenv -e .env.eth.sepolia -- hardhat verify --network sepolia --constructor-args-path ignition/deployments/sepolia-testnet/constructor-args.ts
